alert.note: Alert for Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 1:05PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Riverside and north central San Diego Counties through 145 PM PDT... At 104 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hwy 79 Between Oak Grove And Aguanga, or 10 miles southwest of Anza, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Strong thunderstorm with heavy rain and hail. High wind gusts possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated thunderstorm. IMPACT...Heavy rain and small hail. Possible strong wind gusts to 50 mph. Locations impacted include... Anza, Aguanga, Warner Springs, Hwy 79 Between Oak Grove And Aguanga, Hwy 79 Between Warner Springs And Oak Grove, S7 - East Grade Rd, Lake Henshaw, Palomar Mountain, Hwy 79 Between Santa Ysabel And Warner Springs, Cahuilla Indian Reservation, Oak Grove, Los Coyotes Indian Reservation and La Jolla Indian Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
